__e: I did not think our home could become more annoying, and yet, it has.
No, what's annoying is your lack of desire to make this day special for all of us.
More annoyingly, by having me do it
You are the most annoying person I have ever met.
It bothers me not to be able to say no to you again.
It's really annoying that we spent a lot of money on all this food and that.
That guy you were with, he reminds me of someone so annoying, but I just can't think of who.
Uh, look, if anything, my mom's aggravatingly sweet, but we're not having an argument about who's sweeter, what...
Look, I know you think she's annoying but I think she's all right and I think she's up for it, so...
